title: @Riot  I'm sitting on win 999 and i was wondering if you still did the 1000th win with players :D
body: So i would love to play with a rioter for my 1000th win!

replies.body: We totally do! Let's set up a time to play!
awww so jelly i waited a day for them to respond :'(
Me too, I posted 10 days ago and still no response. :(
I'm sure they don't. I wish they did though, I'm close too.
